duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance and training for nonprofit loan packagers in the USDA 502 Direct Loan Application Packaging.
Ensure compliance with programmatic and administrative regulations for USDA 502 Direct loan files submitted through the RCAC intermediary packaging program.
Manage the electronic submission of 502 files to USDA RD website.
Produce quality loan packages that meet departmental goals.
Maintain compliance by RCAC and Qualified Employers as defined in signed Memorandum of Understandings.
Work closely with lending partners and agencies.
Provide technical assistance in homeownership program development.
Promote and facilitate partnerships to maximize resources, taking the lead with assigned partners.
Prepare activity and outcome reports as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Housing Development, Affordable Mortgage Lending, Housing Counseling or related field (Master's preferred)
